about-me.headline: About Me
about-me.card-part-1: Hi, I'm Simon. I really enjoy how coding lets me create smart, reusable solutions. In my last team project, for example, I achieved this by creating global SCSS variables and mixins that helped maintain consistent styling across all Angular components. I've also completed eight projects on my own, but I enjoy even more how individual strengths come together when working in small teams.
about-me.card-part-2: Let's connect and build something new together!

skills.headline: Core Competencies
skills.description: I really enjoy working with Angular. Its modularity and structure focused on reusability suit me perfectly. Still, I also enjoy writing all the classes myself in vanilla JavaScript, like I did in my browser game “El Pollo Loco”.

growth-mindset.title: Don't see the skill you are looking for?
growth-mindset.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge. Also I have a special interest in learning:

portfolio.headline: My Work
portfolio.text: Take a look at a selection of my projects – You'll get the best sense of my skills by exploring my work yourself.

project.learning-join: I learned the most during Join by integrating Firebase using services and observables.
project.learning-el-pollo-loco: This is where I developed a deeper understanding of how to structure a project involving many objects. In particular, the interaction between classes across different levels became much clearer to me.
project.learning-pokedex: While working with the API, I learned how to use asynchronous functions to access deeply nested data structures.
project.description-join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project.description-pokedex: Interactive Pokédex with data from the PokéAPI. Browse Pokémon by type, view details, and explore animated stats and sprites.
project.description-el-pollo-loco: 2D jump-and-run game built with JavaScript and canvas. Battle enemies, collect bottles, and defeat the final boss with strategic timing.

references.headline: What my colleagues say about me

colleague-quote.quote-1: It was a pleasure working with Simon. His strength clearly lies in logical thinking. Even in challenging situations, he consistently found excellent solutions. Communication with him was always clear, reliable, and pleasant.
colleague-quote.quote-2: Working with Simon was a truly great experience. He was fully committed, always thought ahead, and worked with impressive reliability. His creative input, in particular, really enriched our project.
colleague-quote.quote-3: Our collaboration on the website was both effective and fun. Simon's commitment really pushed the project forward. I'd happily start another project with him anytime.

contact.headline: Together we can achieve more!
contact.text: In a collaborative project, we’ll make it work. I can bring your software design to life and implement interactive logic.
